Data Dictionary - Team Box Scores

Source: vignettes/dictionary_team_box_scores.Rmd
dictionary_team_box_scores.Rmd
knitr::kable(cbbreadr::dictionary_team_box_scores)
field data_type description
game_id integer A unique identifier for each game.
season integer An integer corresponding to a season of college basketball. CBBD’s convention is to use the year in which the championship takes place, so if a game took place in the fall of 2024, the season would be recorded as ““2025”“.
season_label character A string identifying the two years that one college basketball season spans, e.g. ““20242025”“.
season_type character A string identifying whether the tracked game is a ““regular”” season game or a ““postseason”” game.
tournament character If the game takes place as a part of a tournament, this identifies the tournament.
start_date character The start date and time, given in ISO 8601 format in the GMT time zone.
start_time_tbd logical A boolean indicating whether the game time has not yet been scheduled.
team_id integer A unique identifier for each team.
team character The name of the team.
conference character The conference the team plays in.
team_seed integer If reported, the seed of the team in the tournament that the game takes in.
opponent_id integer A unique identifier for the opponent team.
opponent character The name of the opponent team.
opponent_conference character The name of the conference of the opponent team.
opponent_seed integer If reported, the seed of the opponent team in the tournament that the game takes in.
neutral_site logical A boolean indicating that the game took place in a neutral site.
is_home logical A boolean indicating that the team is playing at their home court.
conference_game logical A boolean indicating that the game took place between opponents of the same conference during conference play.
game_type character A string indicating whether the game took place as a normal, regular season game (““STD”“), or whether the game took place as a part of a tournament (”“TRNMNT”“). Tournament games include both regular season and postseason tournaments. For earlier years, this column will sometimes represent the round of the March Madness tournament that a game took place in (”“RD64”“,”“RD32”“,”“RD16”“,”“QTR”“,”“SEMI”“,”“FINAL”“).
notes character Miscellaneous notes about the game, such as the tournament the game is played under.
game_minutes integer The attendance of the game. In some circumstances, attendance is not reported for a game–this is reported as attendance = 0.
pace numeric The number of possessions in the game divided by the number of minutes in the game, multiplied by 40 minutes.
team_stats_possessions integer The number of possessions recorded by the team.
team_stats_assists integer The number of assists recorded by the team.
team_stats_steals integer The number of steals recorded by the team.
team_stats_blocks integer The number of blocks recorded by the team.
team_stats_true_shooting numeric An adjusted statistic that reflects a team’s skill at shooting three-pointers, two-pointers, and free throws. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/True_shooting_percentage
team_stats_rating numeric A metric created by Dean Oliver to measure how many points per 100 possessions a team generates on offense. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Offensive_rating
team_stats_game_score numeric The Hollinger game score for the team. Developed by John Hollinger, you can see more details here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Hollinger#Hollinger_game_score
team_stats_points_total integer The number of points the team scored.
team_stats_points_by_period_1 integer The number of points the team scored in the first period.
team_stats_points_by_period_2 integer The number of points the team scored in the second period.
team_stats_points_by_period_3 integer The number of points the team scored in the first overtime period. If the game did not go to overtime, this value is NULL.
team_stats_points_by_period_4 integer The number of points the team scored in the second overtime period. If the game did not go to 2 OT, this value is NULL.
team_stats_points_by_period_5 integer The number of points the team scored in the third overtime period. If the game did not go to 3OT, this value is NULL.
team_stats_points_by_period_6 integer The number of points the team scored in the fourth overtime period. If the game did not go to 4OT, this value is NULL.
team_stats_points_largest_lead integer The largest lead the team had at any point in the game.
team_stats_points_fast_break integer The number of points the team recorded on fast breaks.
team_stats_points_in_paint integer The number of points the team recorded scoring in the paint.
team_stats_points_off_turnovers integer The number of points the team recorded off turnovers by the opposing team.
team_stats_two_point_field_goals_made integer The number of two-point shots a team made.
team_stats_two_point_field_goals_attempted integer The number of two-point shots a team attempted.
team_stats_two_point_field_goals_pct numeric The number of two-point shots a team made divded by the number of two-point shots they attempted.
team_stats_three_point_field_goals_made integer The number of three-point shots a team made.
team_stats_three_point_field_goals_attempted integer The number of three-point shots a team attempted.
team_stats_three_point_field_goals_pct numeric The number of three-point shots a team made divided by the number of three-point shots they attempted.
team_stats_free_throws_made integer The number of free throw shots a team made.
team_stats_free_throws_attempted integer The number of free throw shots a team attempted.
team_stats_free_throws_pct numeric The number of free throw shots a team made divded by the number of free throw shots they attempted.
team_stats_field_goals_made integer The number of shots from the floor a team made.
team_stats_field_goals_attempted integer The number of shots from the floor a team attempted.
team_stats_field_goals_pct numeric The number of field goals made divided by the number of field goals attempted.
team_stats_turnovers_total integer How many turnovers the team committed.
team_stats_turnovers_team_total integer How many team turnovers the team committed. This includes turnovers like dead-ball turnovers.
team_stats_rebounds_offensive integer The number of offensive rebounds a team recorded.
team_stats_rebounds_defensive integer The number of defensive rebounds a team recorded.
team_stats_rebounds_total integer The total number of rebounds a team recorded, offensive and defensive.
team_stats_fouls_total integer How many fouls the team committed.
team_stats_fouls_technical integer How many technical fouls the team committed.
team_stats_fouls_flagrant integer How many flagrant fouls the team committed.
team_stats_four_factors_effective_field_goal_pct numeric An adjusted statistic that reflects the value of three-pointers relative to all other baskets by weighing three points more, representing a team’s shooting efficiency. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Effective_field_goal_percentage
team_stats_four_factors_free_throw_rate numeric The number of free throws a team attempted divded by the number of field goals a team attempted. This metric is commonly used to evaluate a team’s ability to draw personal fouls.
team_stats_four_factors_turnover_ratio numeric The number of assists a team records divided by the number of turnovers they commit. This metric is commonly used to evaluate the accuracy of a team’s passing.
team_stats_four_factors_offensive_rebound_pct numeric An estimate of the rate at which a team secured offensive reboulds, measured as OREB / the total number of balls that a team could have rebounded. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rebound_rate
opponent_stats_possessions integer The number of possessions recorded by the opposing team.
opponent_stats_assists integer The number of assists recorded by the opposing team.
opponent_stats_steals integer The number of steals recorded by the opposing team.
opponent_stats_blocks integer The number of blocks recorded by the opposing team.
opponent_stats_true_shooting numeric An adjusted statistic that reflects a opposing team’s skill at shooting three-pointers, two-pointers, and free throws. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/True_shooting_percentage
opponent_stats_rating numeric A metric created by Dean Oliver to measure how many points per 100 possessions a opposing team generates on offense. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Offensive_rating
opponent_stats_game_score numeric The Hollinger game score for the opposing team. Developed by John Hollinger, you can see more details here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Hollinger#Hollinger_game_score
opponent_stats_points_total integer The number of points the opposing team scored.
opponent_stats_points_by_period_1 integer The number of points the opposing team scored in the first period.
opponent_stats_points_by_period_2 integer The number of points the opposing team scored in the second period.
opponent_stats_points_by_period_3 integer The number of points the opposing team scored in the first overtime period. If the game did not go to overtime, this value is NULL.
opponent_stats_points_by_period_4 integer The number of points the opposing team scored in the second overtime period. If the game did not go to 2 OT, this value is NULL.
opponent_stats_points_by_period_5 integer The number of points the opposing team scored in the third overtime period. If the game did not go to 3OT, this value is NULL.
opponent_stats_points_by_period_6 integer The number of points the opposing team scored in the fourth overtime period. If the game did not go to 4OT, this value is NULL.
opponent_stats_points_largest_lead integer The largest lead the opposing team had at any point in the game.
opponent_stats_points_fast_break integer The number of points the opposing team recorded on fast breaks.
opponent_stats_points_in_paint integer The number of points the opposing team recorded scoring in the paint.
opponent_stats_points_off_turnovers integer The number of points the opposing team recorded off turnovers by the opposing opposing team.
opponent_stats_two_point_field_goals_made integer The number of two-point shots a opposing team made.
opponent_stats_two_point_field_goals_attempted integer The number of two-point shots a opposing team attempted.
opponent_stats_two_point_field_goals_pct numeric The number of two-point shots a opposing team made divded by the number of two-point shots they attempted.
opponent_stats_three_point_field_goals_made integer The number of three-point shots a opposing team made.
opponent_stats_three_point_field_goals_attempted integer The number of three-point shots a opposing team attempted.
opponent_stats_three_point_field_goals_pct numeric The number of three-point shots a opposing team made divided by the number of three-point shots they attempted.
opponent_stats_free_throws_made integer The number of free throw shots a opposing team made.
opponent_stats_free_throws_attempted integer The number of free throw shots a opposing team attempted.
opponent_stats_free_throws_pct numeric The number of free throw shots a opposing team made divded by the number of free throw shots they attempted.
opponent_stats_field_goals_made integer The number of shots from the floor a opposing team made.
opponent_stats_field_goals_attempted integer The number of shots from the floor a opposing team attempted.
opponent_stats_field_goals_pct numeric The number of field goals made divided by the number of field goals attempted.
opponent_stats_turnovers_total integer How many turnovers the opposing team committed.
opponent_stats_turnovers_team_total integer How many opposing team turnovers the opposing team committed. This includes turnovers like dead-ball turnovers.
opponent_stats_rebounds_offensive integer The number of offensive rebounds a opposing team recorded.
opponent_stats_rebounds_defensive integer The number of defensive rebounds a opposing team recorded.
opponent_stats_rebounds_total integer The total number of rebounds a opposing team recorded, offensive and defensive.
opponent_stats_fouls_total integer How many fouls the opposing team committed.
opponent_stats_fouls_technical integer How many technical fouls the opposing team committed.
opponent_stats_fouls_flagrant integer How many flagrant fouls the opposing team committed.
opponent_stats_four_factors_effective_field_goal_pct numeric An adjusted statistic that reflects the value of three-pointers relative to all other baskets by weighing three points more, representing a opposing team’s shooting efficiency. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Effective_field_goal_percentage
opponent_stats_four_factors_free_throw_rate numeric The number of free throws a opposing team attempted divded by the number of field goals a opposing team attempted. This metric is commonly used to evaluate a opposing team’s ability to draw personal fouls.
opponent_stats_four_factors_turnover_ratio numeric The number of assists a opposing team records divided by the number of turnovers they commit. This metric is commonly used to evaluate the accuracy of a opposing team’s passing.
opponent_stats_four_factors_offensive_rebound_pct numeric An estimate of the rate at which a opposing team secured offensive reboulds, measured as OREB / the total number of balls that a opposing team could have rebounded. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rebound_rate

Developed by John Edwards.
